main.name: Steven Chen
main.description: who is a technologist, business analyst, and critical thinker.
main.bio: Technical-wise, I'm interested in data engineering, full-stack development, data science and analytics. I'm also an product enthusiast, desiring to build the best products that create the most value. Business-wise, I have experience with operations research in context of accounting and financial processes
main.contactmessage: Want to get in contact with me?

education.degree: BSc Honors Computer Science & BA, Honors Business Administration
education.description: 3.9/4.0 GPA in Dual Degree program. Classes that I have taken or am currently taking include Data Structures and Algorithm, Computer Organization and Architecture, Systems Programming, Discrete Math, Calculus, Financial Analysis and Business Decision Making, and more.

work.title: Summer Technology Analyst, Software Developer
work.description: I designed, implemented a data pipeline in Python to deliver structured and unstructured data analytics for the client rep team. I also worked on an ongoing agile development of the company's workflow system by helping create Key Performance Metrics (KPI) using SQL and Business Intelligence (BI) tools. I also helped with testing and used Jira for bug tracking.

work.title: Summer Accounting Assistant
work.description: I worked on developing spreadsheet templates and integrating accounting software to speed up tax and accounting processes.

testimonials.text: Honestly, an mediocre wizard but an amazing friend.
He's a smart guy... Wait, what's this internet thing?
